directions: Heat olive oil in a saucepan over medium heat; cook and stir onion in the hot oil until softened, 5 to 10 minutes. Add salsa and water to onion and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer; add chicken, black beans, and chili powder and return to a simmer. Cover saucepan and simmer chili until chicken is heated through, about 10 minutes.
ingredients: 1 pound rotisserie chicken, meat removed and diced
1 teaspoon chili powder, or to taste
title: Cheater's Chicken Chili
